FAQ.question: Do you offer discounts or promo codes?
FAQ.answer: Yes, we occasionally offer promo codes through email and on special holidays. Stay subscribed to our newsletter.

FAQ.question: How can I track my order?
FAQ.answer: After your order is shipped, you'll receive an email with a tracking number and link to track your package.

FAQ.question: What is your return policy?
FAQ.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy. If you're not satisfied, you can return your product within 30 days for a full refund.

FAQ.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
FAQ.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your account dashboard.

FAQ.question: Are your products suitable for sensitive skin?
FAQ.answer: Yes, our products are dermatologist-tested and safe for sensitive skin.

FAQ.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
FAQ.answer: Yes, gift wrapping is available at checkout for an additional fee.

FAQ.question: Can I change my order after placing it?
FAQ.answer: Yes, you can change your order within 1 hour of placing it by contacting our support team.

FAQ.question: How do I apply a promo code?
FAQ.answer: You can enter your promo code during checkout in the 'Apply Promo Code' box.

FAQ.question: Where are your products manufactured?
FAQ.answer: All of our products are manufactured in facilities located in the USA.

FAQ.question: What if I receive a damaged item?
FAQ.answer: If you receive a damaged item, please contact our support team with a photo and order number for a replacement.

PRODUCTS.question: How often should I replace the blade?
PRODUCTS.answer: We recommend replacing the blade every 3 months for optimal performance.

PRODUCTS.question: Are your products cruelty-free?
PRODUCTS.answer: Yes, all of our products are 100% cruelty-free.

PRODUCTS.question: Do your products contain parabens or sulfates?
PRODUCTS.answer: No, all of our products are paraben and sulfate-free.

PRODUCTS.question: Are your blades replaceable?
PRODUCTS.answer: Yes, all blades are easily replaceable and available on our site.

PRODUCTS.question: Do you offer product bundles?
PRODUCTS.answer: Yes, we offer discounted bundles for grooming and skincare.

PRODUCTS.question: Is your trimmer waterproof?
PRODUCTS.answer: Yes, our trimmers are waterproof and safe to use in the shower.

PRODUCTS.question: Can I use your products on all body areas?
PRODUCTS.answer: Yes, our products are designed to be safe for all body areas.

PRODUCTS.question: How long does the battery last on your trimmer?
PRODUCTS.answer: The battery lasts up to 90 minutes on a full charge.

PRODUCTS.question: What is the shelf life of your skincare products?
PRODUCTS.answer: Our skincare products have a shelf life of 12–24 months.

SHIPPING.question: Do you ship internationally?
SHIPPING.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries. Shipping fees and times may vary depending on location.

SHIPPING.question: How long does shipping take?
SHIPPING.answer: Orders typically arrive within 5–7 business days for domestic shipping.

SHIPPING.question: Can I change my shipping address?
SHIPPING.answer: Yes, contact support within 1 hour of placing your order to change the address.

SHIPPING.question: Do you offer express shipping?
SHIPPING.answer: Yes, express and overnight shipping options are available at checkout.

SHIPPING.question: Are there any customs charges?
SHIPPING.answer: International orders may be subject to customs duties or taxes.

SHIPPING.question: Will I get tracking info?
SHIPPING.answer: Yes, you will receive tracking info via email once your order is shipped.

SHIPPING.question: What if my package is lost?
SHIPPING.answer: If your package is lost, contact support with your order number and we’ll investigate.

SHIPPING.question: Do you ship to PO Boxes?
SHIPPING.answer: Yes, we ship to PO Boxes using standard delivery services.

SHIPPING.question: Can I pick up my order in person?
SHIPPING.answer: Currently, we do not offer in-person pickup.

SHIPPING.question: How much is shipping?
SHIPPING.answer: Shipping is free for orders over $50. Otherwise, rates are calculated at checkout.

BILLING.question: What payment methods do you accept?
BILLING.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, UPI, and most major credit/debit cards.

BILLING.question: Can I use multiple promo codes?
BILLING.answer: Only one promo code can be applied per order.

BILLING.question: Do you offer refunds?
BILLING.answer: Yes, refunds are processed within 5–10 business days after returns.

BILLING.question: Can I update my billing address?
BILLING.answer: Yes, log into your account to update billing details.

BILLING.question: Do you offer subscription billing?
BILLING.answer: Yes, subscriptions are billed monthly and can be canceled anytime.

BILLING.question: How can I get a copy of my invoice?
BILLING.answer: You can find your invoice in the order confirmation email or under 'My Orders' in your account dashboard.

BILLING.question: Will I be charged tax?
BILLING.answer: Applicable taxes are calculated at checkout based on your location.

BILLING.question: Why was my payment declined?
BILLING.answer: Payments may be declined due to incorrect info or bank restrictions.

BILLING.question: Can I pay in installments?
BILLING.answer: Yes, installment options are available via select payment partners.

BILLING.question: Is my payment information secure?
BILLING.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and do not store card details.
